utils3 - vx.x.x Documentation

Overview

Contents   ::   Detailed Module Design  »

Overview¶

utils3 is a centralised Python library of commonly used utilities. These utilities include database connection classes, colourmaps, config file (JSON) loading, program event logging, error reporting, console user interface, etc.

The utils3 package is a continuation of utils v6.1.5, and has been updated to support Python 3.5.

Change log information can be viewed on the Change Log page, using the link below.
